website_summaries.verdict: A good basic set of Joy-Con wheels that is available in multiple colors.
pros: Each set comes with 2 wheels and is available either in neon yellow or in red/blue
Easy to put the Joy-Con in the wheel and to remove when you're done with your racing game
cons: You have to press the top buttons in a little more for them to register

customer_reviews.title: A nice, somewhat cheaper alternative to the official steering wheels.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when I ordered Mario Kart 8 Deluxe for my 8 year old son. They fit the joy-cons perfectly and work very well. I have to admit they are smaller than I thought they'd be, but it makes sense given their size relative to the controllers and the original steering wheels from the Wii. I've added a picture for scale. Overall, though, very good accessories for the Nintendo Switch and Mario Kart 8 Deluxe.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Small, not for adult hands.
customer_reviews.text: I suppose a Nintendo Switch is designed for children, so adults are always going to have trouble holding small controllers. These wheels are tiny. They would fit inside the wheels used for a Wii. Adult hands get cramped while trying to relive old glory while playing Mario Kart and getting beat by children. I do like the colors though. When playing with four people it makes it easier to remember which controller belongs to each person. We bought this pack of blue and red and another set of black ones. Black controllers go into the red and blue. Red and blue controllers go into the black wheels. Easy.
customer_reviews.author: Scooby921Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: perfect, exactly what i expected
customer_reviews.text: arrived on time (thanks prime) and are perfect. little bumpers on the back make using the top bumpers in mario kart much easier. there’s an unexpected gap on either side of the controller but it’s only so the wheel can be used with either remote.. not a defect :) i’m holding the blue controller and my 5 year old daughter is holding the red one, for size reference.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Great steering wheel controller for the Switch
customer_reviews.text: These work great! There's a little bit of side-to-side play in the slot for the controller, so that the joycon can slip around about a half-inch, but it's nothing serious (and I think it might even be intentional, because if you line up the + or - button with the controller, then the should buttons align perfectly for the left and right joycons. They're comfortable to hold (although more for a kid's hands than an adult's), the should buttons work well, and the colors match exactly. They're also easy to get the joycon into and out of (my not-quite-6-year-old can do it easily) and they hold securely without any concern that the joycon might slip out.
customer_reviews.author: Larson

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy them again
customer_reviews.text: These switch steering wheels are pretty good for playing Mario Kart 8 on the Switch. You line up either the "+" or the "-" depending on which controller you're using with the marking on the wheel to make sure the triggers line up. The triggers are a little spongy, can be hard to know when you've pressed them hard enough to activate without something happening on screen. I've never used the official ones to know if that's the same, but it's the only downside I can think of for these. I'd buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: L. C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: These work great with the switch controllers! We played soooo much Mario Kart 8 over Christmas break and these got a good workout. The only semi-negative thing I would say is they are much smaller than I expected. That said, even the adults used them with no problems. And honestly, the switch controllers are so tiny to begin with that it actually was nice to have something bigger to hold onto
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are clearly 3-D printed and came in the bright green color shown in the picture. I didn't think I'd mind the color not matching the joy con colors, but it turns out I do wish I had the matching colors. No big deal though and certainly not the products fault! I got these for a great price and they do just what I'd needed them to do and makes playing games like mario kart using motion controls far more palatable.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Half the price of the official wheels. Works just as well.
customer_reviews.text: Got these to play with Mario Kart, as a cheaper supplement to the “official” Nintendo wheels we already had. These Amazon wheels have a textured finish that makes them less pleasing to hold, compared to the smooth finish of the Nintendo wheels. On the other hand the shoulder buttons have a more positive action and feel better. Ultimately not enough of a difference to justify the higher price of the Nintendo wheel over this one.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle Belzile

customer_reviews.title: Fun and actually helpful!
customer_reviews.text: These wheels do the job perfectly! Unlike the Wii version, these are more than just a fun add-on. You really do need them, especially if you are an adult. The small size of the Switch controllers doesn't translate well to the motion-sensing control option. These wheels are a cheap way to make the game more fun and maybe even easier for adults with larger hands.
customer_reviews.author: A Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, poor packaging 🤦🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: These are great for what we need and came super quickly, but seriously y’all, could we not put “Nintendo Switch” on the sticker of the mailing box? Especially around the holidays? 1. People steal crap off porches and this is just a dead giveaway and 2. The person who is receiving the system for Christmas went to get packages off the porch today, and is thankfully an oblivious man who does not tend to take notice. There is usually a disclaimer about it arriving in original packaging to give the option of gift wrapping. I would have done that had it been noted. So just keep that in mind 😁
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth7695

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit every controller like the Nintendo version
customer_reviews.text: The regular Nintendo wheels have two divets in each side so they will fit any controller. These ones only have one side diveted. If you bought a switch that came with the red and blue controllers, you'll probably be okay. For some reason, if you buy the red/blue controllers separately, the colors are switched. I bought the joy cons separately. So now, only my blue controller fits in the red wheel. My red controller only fits in the blue wheel. This is extremely annoying and was completely not thought through. Other than that, the wheels work great.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Better than the original
customer_reviews.text: These steering wheels are amazing and affordable. I would say better than the original Nintendo ones. The triggers on the back are very springy and the size of the wheels allow all sizes of hands get a good grip. They leave no fingerprints. The controllers are easy to put in and take out of the stirring wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Julia De Jongh

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than Wii wheels
customer_reviews.text: These wheels are made well and the controllers fit perfectly, so no complaints there. Great value too. They’re just a little too small to be comfortable in my opinion, since they’re considerably smaller than the wheels I’m used to from the Wii. Since the Switch is so portable, we usually just end up using the JoyCons with the wrist strap attachment instead of the wheels and they just sit at home - rarely used.
customer_reviews.author: LindenTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Will not turn with motion need to use buttons
customer_reviews.text: I bought a game before the switch which requires a lot of driving but and I but this remote controls not good not good I expected it to turn when I turn right or left but that's not how it works you still have to use the buttons to control and not the movement on the steering wheel I would send it back but whatever
customer_reviews.author: ROSIE

customer_reviews.title: They’re very small but work....
customer_reviews.text: They’re nice but too small. They’re like mini steering wheels. If you’re used to the Wii steering wheel, this will definitely take some getting used to. I’ve used it a couple of times so far... I may end up liking it more, but so far, it’s eh.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Dieterle

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't Imagine Playing Mario Kart without these
customer_reviews.text: Did not have the opportunity to judge vs. genuine Nintendo gear, but they're built well. Bought two packs (4 wheels) for head-to-head-to-head-to-head family action. With these and Mario Kart - it's the best family fun going for the Switch right now.
customer_reviews.author: R. Polakowski

customer_reviews.title: Still in 2nd place - wheels are great though.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these thinking I could defeat my wife in Mario Kart. If your wife is better at this game save yourself a few bucks. It doesn’t matter. 2nd place finish for the rest of your life. Product works as describes though. Triggers are responsive. No need to get the more expensive brands
customer_reviews.author: AhsokaTano

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: It came with a perfect package, it kept the product safe from any possible damage. The kids loves it and it's more fun to play with this controls. Delivered on time and item is as described.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Sabala

customer_reviews.title: Good product for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect and the right price. I need another set, but I wish they came in the pink/green combo so they would match our new Joy-Cons. I will buying these again for the new controllers.
customer_reviews.author: geekmommy

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids playing Mario Kart
customer_reviews.text: Got these so our girls could play mario kart. They had a hard time with holding the remotes level otherwise. They loved these, and while they're still a bit young to get all the basics, they enjoyed being able to make the karts go.
customer_reviews.author: iceph03nix

customer_reviews.title: Neat.
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our grandchildren for a present and when they used them, they had fun. It took the youngest one a little longer to get the hang of it, but she did. I like the different colors for them to identify with and they seemed to work well for them.
customer_reviews.author: Paisley

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive option
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my kids to play Mario Kart. They love them and are able to use them easily. They're a bit small for adults, but for the price they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, functional
customer_reviews.text: The joycons fit perfectly, and the wheels are comfortable to use. Of course, these are frivolous since they don't add any functionality to any games, but they are still a fun accessory. They don't detract from the usability of any of the buttons or motion sensitivity. They are just what I thought they would be, so I'm satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: noone

customer_reviews.title: Small but the kids like.
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally ended up with 4 wheels somehow. I dunno... maybe I hit the "2" button. I have twins, so I was thinking they both needed one. But these are SO SMALL! It's really not like driving a car at all. I dunno. The kids like them though.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: They work great
customer_reviews.text: These are the wheels you've been looking for. Ignore bad reviews on this product. I've had these for over three months now, and they work perfectly. you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for your Switch controllers
customer_reviews.text: Fits the controllers perfectly with no issues. Easy to get the controllers in and out and buttons have a great feel to them. We've put many hours in with these and MarioKart 8 and it's been great.
customer_reviews.author: Scott J

customer_reviews.title: Steering Wheels Work as You'd Expect...Because They're Steering Wheels
customer_reviews.text: There isn't much to say about these things as they're just plastic steering wheels meant to hold joy-cons. But they do their job admirable and haven't failed yet. And best of all they match the color of the red and blue controllers!
customer_reviews.author: BlackHairedGuy

customer_reviews.title: They fit, they match.
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love playing MarioKart on the Switch with these wheels. Me, I prefer using the joystick and buttons but then I'm a lot older. These are inexpensive as Nintendo gear goes and the colors match perfectly. Fit is fine also.
customer_reviews.author: Holly AW

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper alternative!
customer_reviews.text: These look and feel the same as the name brand steering wheels. They have been knocked around by 2 young kids and still work just fine. The controllers fit snugly in them and have not fallen out yet. The buttons on the back may not be as responsive as the ones on the name brand steering wheel but a 7yr old probably won’t notice. I recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Grandson along with Mario Kart 8. He explained how to use each one and he and his Brother proceeded to play the game with them. This gift was a good choice, I am happy to say.
customer_reviews.author: Susan R

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: These steering wheels are great for little hands. You may need to get a pro controller for bigger hands, but these are way cheaper, so I'm a fan!
customer_reviews.author: J. Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and small
customer_reviews.text: the wheels are so cute and small. My mom uses a white one for the wii u MK8 and loves using it, so got her these for our switch and she loves them even more. Their easy to use. Would buy again if i Didn't need just 2. Also the color is pretty.
customer_reviews.author: HeyDanisaurus

customer_reviews.title: Low cost but barely works
customer_reviews.text: The positioning of the L and R buttons is super finicky on one of the pair and has to be placed very deliberately or it doesn't work. Sure they are super cheap but they are below the quality line that even makes them worth the time to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrett Dunn

customer_reviews.title: My kids enjoy them. If you have Mario Cart or any ...
customer_reviews.text: Works Well. My kids enjoy them. If you have Mario Cart or any other driving games where 4 kids can play, it may be easier just to purchase 4 as the kids will fuss over them if you have a play date or party..
customer_reviews.author: D. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy work but still works
customer_reviews.text: They arrived on time. But the boxes were already open. Why is that? The amazonbasics sticker seal was already broken. I bought 2 sets of 2. Both seals were broken and one package did not have the set in their individual plastic wrapping. Pretty sloppy. Granted, they work just fine. Just seems like the packaging insinuates customer disregard.
customer_reviews.author: Otsuki D. Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Cheap feel
customer_reviews.text: They do what they are supposed to but the plastic they use feels very thin and cheap. They are "Basic" and do match the controllers well.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great Price & Quality
customer_reviews.text: I always worry when buying something other than name brand for consoles that it won't fit quite right but that was not the case for these wheels. The Nintendo switch controller fit flawlessly into the steering wheel. If you want to save money and get good quality wheels then I would recommend getting these!
customer_reviews.author: Starla

customer_reviews.title: Good enough!
customer_reviews.text: Basic steering wheels that get the job done for playing Mario kart! Not the nicest quality, but not junky either. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepymama

customer_reviews.title: Amazing steering wheels
customer_reviews.text: This item is hands down amazing it’s beautiful colours which is nice and works awesome and the price is amazing a must have
customer_reviews.author: A/J Vance

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but they do the trick
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely nothing to write home about but they serve their purpose. They are what I would expect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke L.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was expecting....
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect for what we needed. Something inexpensive and my 8 year old loves the size. They make Mario Kart a little more immersive. Everything lines up and the top buttons work, so you really can't complain for $10.
customer_reviews.author: Preston Family est: 2006Top Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Was given as gift.
customer_reviews.text: Unsure if they were legit but they work and fit the switch controls. Turning the wheel does nothing but there are triggers on back side to turn left or right.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Work well, but a little on the small side
customer_reviews.text: These wheels fit the Switch remote well and work fine. My only note is that they are a little on the small side. If they were another inch or so in diameter, I think they'd feel a lot better in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: Austen

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth buying
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a set so our kids could play Mario Kart together on our Nintendo Switch. It’s so much more comfortable to play using these steering wheel adapters. Our hands cramp up if we try to use just the joy cons alone.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Switzer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for MARIO kart. These are a great substitute for the Nintendo branded wheels. Great quality and feel.
customer_reviews.author: JCampbell

customer_reviews.title: Small but OK
customer_reviews.text: They are fine but are SUPER tiny. I guess 5 stars would be for a perfect product and the small size brings it down to a 4
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Very Small
customer_reviews.text: Very nice to hold, press the shoulder buttons, and spin. My only gripe with it is how small they actually are, I mean they must be as small if not smaller than a regular bagel. Great product but make them bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Yes these are small, as other reviewers mentioned, but they work great with the Switch joy cons and make Mario Karting super fun! Excellent price!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen614

customer_reviews.title: Makes the games more fun when you play against someone
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to play Mario kart 8 with the joint con controllers if you don't have a wheel like this. I really like it. You don't have to use tilt steer, but you can if you want to. It makes holding down the Accelerator button much easier
customer_reviews.author: DR DEADPOOL

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my nephew for Christmas along with a game. He was very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: sheryl brockett

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Waist smaller than I thought they'd be. Looks more like a 4 year olds steering wheel
customer_reviews.author: Hartland

customer_reviews.title: Ergonomic solution
customer_reviews.text: The remotes fit well, be sure to turn them on before putting them in the wheel because there is no access to the power button. Removing them is very easy. Very ergonomic solution for playing Mario Kart
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Graham

customer_reviews.title: Brings me back to childhood, tiny make believe wheels ...
customer_reviews.text: Brings me back to childhood, tiny make believe wheels :) Product has OK feel (it's plastic after all, but at least the controllers fit without hassle), cheaper than what Nintendo has, I say go for it.
customer_reviews.author: nui

customer_reviews.title: Works great, no complaints.
customer_reviews.text: These work great and as expected. Not too small and still feel comfortable in your hands. Not too big to clutter up the entertainment center. And honestly the bright green color helps me find them when they get "misplaced" in the toy box!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Very Small
customer_reviews.text: Not sure I am a fan of these VERY small steering wheels. I was excited about the price and if you read the descriptions they didn't mislead. It is just very very small.
customer_reviews.author: theschlay

customer_reviews.title: Very fun to use!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece and nephews and they are loving it! They used it with Mario Kart on the NS Switch! Love the dual colors you get from this item. It fit your controllers very snug and can handle abuse. Highly recommended for kids!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: Way too small for an adult, and my six year old doesn't even like to use them for Mario Kart
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Some people like to play with them and some don’t. The quality of them is good though, that’s the important part. Cute neon color too.
customer_reviews.author: L. Newman

customer_reviews.title: They are what they are
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to mess this type of product up... it works fine. It's easy to use. The materials didn't give me chemical burns... it's a win.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great add-on for joy-cons
customer_reviews.text: These are great, simple accessories to use with the various driving games we own. The kids LOVE these for Mario Kart!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice deal!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect slots to fit the Joy-Cons, the clicks are great. Handles are comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Leo T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super fun colors, excellent size to carry everywhere. My children love playing Super Mario Kart
customer_reviews.author: Marijose

customer_reviews.title: Kids love these for Mario Kart
customer_reviews.text: The kids are 6 and 8 and love these for Mario Kart. They work exactly as they should, and are priced better than the brand name alternative. The wheels are a little smaller than I expected but makes sense in the scale of the joyCon controller
customer_reviews.author: San Diego Car Guy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for mariokart
customer_reviews.text: Gift along with mariokart8 for my boyfriends birthday. They both work excellent and we both love them and use them often
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Not necessary.
customer_reviews.text: Not necessary to play Mario Kart 8. Don't even function as steering wheels, which I thought they did. They just make the controller a little easier to hold in 2-player mode.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Mc_N

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: They are great just wish there were more games to use it on other than Mario cart.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just the perfect size for lumberjack-handed people. Gonna be a hit at the NASCAR committee Christmas party.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Good for the switch.
customer_reviews.text: Kids were happy with their controls. This works just great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Husband enjoyed the small xmas gift. Him and my son like using them when playing Mariokart.
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten Jones

customer_reviews.title: easy to hook up
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson for Christmas to go with his game Mario Cart deluxe, for his Nintendo switch, he had a blast, easy to hook up, came as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: As good as the Nintendo brand for a better price
customer_reviews.text: As good as the Nintendo brand for a better price. But unfortunately just as small too. If I were about 30 years younger (or had kids), these would have been great.
customer_reviews.author: Mooj

customer_reviews.title: Speed of delivery was imperative. It happened!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was visiting and had a game program with him on which a variety of games can be played. I purchased a vehicle racing game which required the steering wheels to play. They had to be delivered with speed to be of use while he was here.. they arrived overnight, they worked perfectly and the game was a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good wheels for a good value.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to insert and remove the Joy-Cons. L and R buttons work as expected. I see no faults in productions. Build quality is good. Overall, great wheels for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lee A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Mariokart 8
customer_reviews.text: I got the wheels as describe with great shipping! This item is a Christmas gift for my nieces.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Tiny!!
customer_reviews.text: Tiny!!!! Even for my 6yr olds little hands. They would just rather use the joycons
customer_reviews.author: Kelly W

customer_reviews.title: Necessity
customer_reviews.text: Whole family uses these. Wouldn’t want to play without them!
customer_reviews.author: Karley smith

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: These work well. They are small but they fit the joy cons and make Mario kart easier. I reinforced with the kids how to properly seat them so they work every time.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with the size of these wheels and my six year old has trouble making the turns in his game with them.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Functional but small
customer_reviews.text: Well made, great price but they are pretty small. Disappointed in the size.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift for my grandson’s birthday
customer_reviews.text: Can’t really review this one because it was a gift would have to ask my grandson how he likes it and then I could put another review in for you
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: but they're solid and don't seem like they'll break easy if you throw them when you ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly, but haven't got to use them yet because I don't own Mario kart, but they're solid and don't seem like they'll break easy if you throw them when you lose.
customer_reviews.author: Jaryd D

customer_reviews.title: Simple design
customer_reviews.text: Simple product. They make Mario Kart fun. They’re helpful in making the joy con controllers feel more like a regular controller.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Lady

customer_reviews.title: Nice wheels
customer_reviews.text: Works great and makes the Mario kart game much more fun
customer_reviews.author: Lostleader

customer_reviews.title: Great feel
customer_reviews.text: Color match to the controllers is spot on. Feel is great. I do wish they were larger, but they are matching the nintendo ones so the size makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: Bearded Tech Guy

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Got these to pair with a Mario Kart game I gifted my boyfriend and they're perfect. Def get these and save over Nintendo brand steering wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Macias

customer_reviews.title: They work, the Price is right
customer_reviews.text: Come on, it's just more fun to play Mario cart with the wheels and Amazon has a great price. Start your engines!
customer_reviews.author: Magoo

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, lots of fun; worth it!
customer_reviews.text: A bit on the small side (for adults), but works great and is lots of fun. A great Amazon product!
customer_reviews.author: Cat reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, Great price!
customer_reviews.text: great quality! my family loves playing Mario kart with these steering wheels!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Vroom
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in tip-top shape. Took some getting used to after years of using the Wii wheels but this works great with the Switch!
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve Fortner

customer_reviews.title: They feel great and the controllers fit in them really well
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves these wheels. They feel great and the controllers fit in them really well.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve walker

customer_reviews.title: Not necessary.
customer_reviews.text: I thought that these wheels would actually control the game like Wii, but they don’t. They’re light plastic and just feel like a baby toy. Not necessary for the game - just decoration to bring back the arcade game feel.
customer_reviews.author: Meridith

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable
customer_reviews.text: My kids love playing super Mario kart with the wheel!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: They are small but my kids love them. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Nevarez

customer_reviews.title: most excellent! They feel very much like you would expect
customer_reviews.text: For the price, most excellent! They feel very much like you would expect, light and kinda cheap. But they are sturdy and the buttons make solid contact.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilio Jaramillo II

customer_reviews.title: Glad I saved the money and bought these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I bought them as an accessory gift for my husbands new Switch. Glad I saved the money. The work great!
customer_reviews.author: KeshiaSkye

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool...
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my son for Christmas with the switch. He enjoys them!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Fun to use with nitendo switch game however I thought the devices would be if a softer material like rubber and not hard plastic
customer_reviews.author: CHARMAYNE B

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. My son loves them for Mario Kart. Plus they were the best price I could find!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. I was able to get 2 sets(4 steering wheels) for about $8. Even though they are neon yellow they work as intended.
customer_reviews.author: iKeablr

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Pretty self explanatory, small but that was expected. Bought to go along with my nephew's Nintendo switch he is getting for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Unique

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics Steering Wheel Controller for Nintendo Switch - Set of 2, Blue And Red
feature_bullets: 2 steering wheels (blue and red) for Nintendo Switch; each wheel holds a Joy-con controller (not included)
One for left controller and one for right so you can play with a friend; ideal for racing games
Dual-injection grip for a comfortable hold, even during long playing sessions; large SR / SL shoulder buttons for ultimate control
Built with additional padding to protect Joy-con controllers while in use; Joy-Con controllers and Switch device sold separately
Backed by an AmazonBasics limited one-year warranty
